memberdef.argsstring: (typename boost::graph_traits< PolygonMesh >::halfedge_descriptor h, const PolygonMesh &pmesh, const NamedParameters &np=parameters::default_values())
memberdef.name: edge_length

briefdescription.para: computes the length of an edge of a given polygon mesh.

detaileddescription.para: The edge is given by one of its halfedges, or the edge itself.

parameterdescription.para: a model of HalfedgeGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
one halfedge of the edge whose length is computed
the polygon mesh to which h belongs
an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of pmesh
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
an instance of a geometric traits class
Type: a class model of Kernel
Default: a CGAL Kernel deduced from the point type, using CGAL::Kernel_traits
Extra: The geometric traits class must be compatible with the vertex point type.

simplesect.para: the length of h. The return type FT is a number type either deduced from the geom_traits Named Parameters if provided, or the geometric traits class deduced from the point property map of pmesh.
This function involves a square root computation. If FT does not support the sqrt() operation, the square root computation will be performed approximately.

memberdef.argsstring: (typename boost::graph_traits< PolygonMesh >::halfedge_descriptor h, const PolygonMesh &pmesh, const NamedParameters &np=parameters::default_values())
memberdef.name: squared_edge_length

briefdescription.para: computes the squared length of an edge of a given polygon mesh.

detaileddescription.para: The edge is given by one of its halfedges, or the edge itself.

parameterdescription.para: a model of HalfedgeGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
one halfedge of the edge whose squared length is computed
the polygon mesh to which h belongs
an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of pmesh
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
an instance of a geometric traits class
Type: a class model of Kernel
Default: a CGAL Kernel deduced from the point type, using CGAL::Kernel_traits
Extra: The geometric traits class must be compatible with the vertex point type.

simplesect.para: the squared length of h. The return type FT is a number type either deduced from the geom_traits Named Parameters if provided, or the geometric traits class deduced from the point property map of pmesh.

memberdef.argsstring: (typename boost::graph_traits< PolygonMesh >::halfedge_descriptor h, const PolygonMesh &pmesh, const NamedParameters &np=parameters::default_values())
memberdef.name: face_border_length

briefdescription.para: computes the length of the border polyline that contains a given halfedge.

parameterdescription.para: a model of HalfedgeGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
a halfedge of the border polyline whose length is computed
the polygon mesh to which h belongs
an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of pmesh
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
an instance of a geometric traits class
Type: a class model of Kernel
Default: a CGAL Kernel deduced from the point type, using CGAL::Kernel_traits
Extra: The geometric traits class must be compatible with the vertex point type.

simplesect.para: the length of the sequence of border edges of face(h, pmesh). The return type FT is a number type either deduced from the geom_traits Named Parameters if provided, or the geometric traits class deduced from the point property map of pmesh.
This function involves a square root computation. If Kernel::FT does not support the sqrt() operation, the square root computation will be performed approximately.

briefdescription.para: finds the longest border of a given triangulated surface and returns a halfedge that is part of this border as well as the length of this border.

parameterdescription.para: a model of HalfedgeGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
the polygon mesh
an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of pmesh
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
an instance of a geometric traits class
Type: a class model of Kernel
Default: a CGAL Kernel deduced from the point type, using CGAL::Kernel_traits
Extra: The geometric traits class must be compatible with the vertex point type.

simplesect.para:
a pair composed of two members:
first: a halfedge on the longest border. The return type halfedge_descriptor is a halfedge descriptor. It is deduced from the graph traits corresponding to the type PolygonMesh. first is among the halfedges reported by extract_boundary_cycles().
second: the length of the longest border The return type FT is a number type either deduced from the geom_traits Named Parameters if provided, or the geometric traits class deduced from the point property map of pmesh
This function involves a square root computation. If Kernel::FT does not support the sqrt() operation, the square root computation will be performed approximately.

a sequence of Named Parameters

an instance of a geometric traits class
Type: a class model of Kernel
Default: a CGAL Kernel deduced from the point type, using CGAL::Kernel_traits
Extra: The geometric traits class must be compatible with the vertex point type.

simplesect.para: the area of f. The return type FT is a number type either deduced from the geom_traits Named Parameters if provided, or the geometric traits class deduced from the point property map of tmesh.
This function involves a square root computation. If Kernel::FT does not support the sqrt() operation, the square root computation will be performed approximately.

briefdescription.para: computes the squared area of a face of a given triangulated surface mesh.

parameterdescription.para: a model of FaceGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
the face whose squared area is computed
the triangulated surface mesh to which f belongs
an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of tmesh
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<TriangleMesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
an instance of a geometric traits class
Type: a class model of Kernel
Default: a CGAL Kernel deduced from the point type, using CGAL::Kernel_traits
Extra: The geometric traits class must be compatible with the vertex point type.

simplesect.para: the squared area of f. The return type FT is a number type either deduced from the geom_traits Named Parameters if provided, or the geometric traits class deduced from the point property map of tmesh.

briefdescription.para: computes the area of a range of faces of a given triangulated surface mesh.

parameterdescription.para: range of boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh>::face_descriptor, model of Range. Its iterator type is InputIterator.
a model of FaceGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
the range of faces of whose area is computed
the triangulated surface mesh to which the faces of face_range belong
an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of tmesh
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<TriangleMesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
an instance of a geometric traits class
Type: a class model of Kernel
Default: a CGAL Kernel deduced from the point type, using CGAL::Kernel_traits
Extra: The geometric traits class must be compatible with the vertex point type.

simplesect.para: sum of face areas of faces. The return type FT is a number type either deduced from the geom_traits Named Parameters if provided, or the geometric traits class deduced from the point property map of tmesh.
This function involves a square root computation. If Kernel::FT does not support the sqrt() operation, the square root computation will be performed approximately.

briefdescription.para: computes the surface area of a triangulated surface mesh.

parameterdescription.para: a model of FaceGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
the triangulated surface mesh
an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of tmesh
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<TriangleMesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
an instance of a geometric traits class
Type: a class model of Kernel
Default: a CGAL Kernel deduced from the point type, using CGAL::Kernel_traits
Extra: The geometric traits class must be compatible with the vertex point type.

simplesect.para: the surface area of tmesh. The return type FT is a number type either deduced from the geom_traits Named Parameters if provided, or the geometric traits class deduced from the point property map of tmesh.
This function involves a square root computation. If Kernel::FT does not support the sqrt() operation, the square root computation will be performed approximately.

briefdescription.para: computes the volume of the domain bounded by a closed triangulated surface mesh.

a sequence of Named Parameters
the closed triangulated surface mesh bounding the volume
an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

simplesect.para: tmesh is closed

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of tmesh
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<TriangleMesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
an instance of a geometric traits class
Type: a class model of Kernel
Default: a CGAL Kernel deduced from the point type, using CGAL::Kernel_traits
Extra: The geometric traits class must be compatible with the vertex point type.

simplesect.para: the volume bounded by tmesh. The return type FT is a number type either deduced from the geom_traits Named Parameters if provided, or the geometric traits class deduced from the point property map of tmesh.

memberdef.argsstring: (const PolygonMesh1 &m1, const PolygonMesh2 &m2, FacePairOutputIterator common, FaceOutputIterator1 m1_only, FaceOutputIterator2 m2_only, const NamedParameters1 &np1=parameters::default_values(), const NamedParameters2 &np2=parameters::default_values())
memberdef.name: match_faces

briefdescription.para: identifies faces only present in m1 and m2 as well as the faces present in both polygon meshes.

detaileddescription.para: Two faces are matching if they have the same orientation and the same points.

parameterdescription.para: a model of HalfedgeListGraph and FaceListGraph
a model of HalfedgeListGraph and FaceListGraph
model of OutputIterator holding boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh1>::face_descriptor.
model of OutputIterator holding boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh2>::face_descriptor.
model of OutputIterator holding std::pair<boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh1>::face_descriptor, boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh2>::face_descriptor.
a sequence of Named Parameters
a sequence of Named Parameters
the first polygon mesh
the second polygon mesh
output iterator collecting the faces that are common to both meshes
output iterator collecting the faces that are only in m1
output iterator collecting the faces that are only in m2
an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below
an optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of m1
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh1>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type. Point_3 must be LessThanComparable.
Extra: The same holds for m2 and PolygonMesh2 and the point type must be the same for both meshes.
a property map associating to each vertex of m1 a unique index between 0 and num_vertices(m1) - 1, and similarly for m2.
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and std::size_t as value type
Default: an automatically indexed internal map

Extra: If this parameter is not passed, internal machinery will create and initialize a face index property map, either using the internal property map if it exists or using an external map. The latter might result in - slightly - worsened performance in case of non-constant complexity for index access. The same holds for m2 and PolygonMesh2.

briefdescription.para: Functions to compute lengths of edges and borders, areas of faces and patches, as well as volumes of closed meshes.
